title: Teena
additional-note: This was a comic book featuring the title character of the newspaper comic strip 'Teena', created by Hilda Terry.  The newspaper strip 'Teena' began in 1944, following on Terry's 'It's a Girl's Life', which had begun in 1941.  Both comics were distributed by King Features Syndicate.  There may be active renewals covering the newspaper comics.
